## Setup

We prepare the data similarly as in [CPMT1](../cpmt01.qmd).

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tern)
library(dplyr)

adtte <- scda::synthetic_cdisc_data("rcd_2022_06_27")$adtte %>%
  df_explicit_na() %>%
  filter(PARAMCD == "OS", BEP01FL == "Y") %>%
  mutate(
    AVAL = day2month(AVAL),
    AVALU = "Months",
    is_event = CNSR == 0
  ) %>%
  var_relabel(
    BMRKR1 = "Biomarker (Continuous)",
    BMRKR2 = "Biomarker (Categorical)"
  )
```
